Package com.sweatshop.path.screens

Class MultiplayerGameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.sweatshop.path.screens.AbstractScreen
com.sweatshop.path.screens.GameScreen
com.sweatshop.path.screens.MultiplayerGameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class MultiplayerGameScreen extends GameScreen
The main game screen for multiplayer mode. Handles the gameplay logic and rendering for both host and client players.
